data.lyric:
[ti:Get Ugly (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Baby]
[al:My Turn (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Get Ugly - Lil Baby
[00:01.34]Lyrics by：Dominique Jones/Jacob Canady
[00:02.68]Composed by：Dominique Jones/Jacob Canady
[00:04.02]Young Scooter：
[00:23.66]ATL Jacob ATL Jacob
[00:26.90]It can get ugly
[00:28.82]Huh
[00:29.31]Would you leave or stay like you love me
[00:32.16]From the bottom all I know is the struggle
[00:35.18]Can't get no job so all I know is the hustle
[00:38.62]Yeah bankroll gettin' bigger
[00:40.23]N***a
[00:40.65]Empire gettin' built up givin' racks to the right n***a
[00:43.88]I can get a pack overnight ain't nothin' like you n***as
[00:47.10]Sippin' syrup 'til my body numb I ain't tryna catch no feelings
[00:50.06]I ain't never bite no n***a
[00:51.53]She give me brain now 'cause I'm famous
[00:53.15]I got these chains on gettin' tangled
[00:54.79]I'm in the big Benz not a Wrangler
[00:56.41]It's still a Jeep though it ain't cheap ho
[00:58.07]I'm just happy they gon' free Rico
[00:59.83]Dodgin' stank h*es and R.I.C.O.
[01:01.59]I'ma spin a van with them Dracos
[01:03.13]Probably ridin' around with Starlito
[01:04.72]I'ma bust it down with my lil' bros
[01:06.36]Buy cars for all of my kinfolk
[01:08.10]If the sack ever did get low
[01:09.64]God knows it's gon' be a robbery
[01:11.19]Why the f**k everybody callin' me
[01:12.90]Everybody who left took a part of me
[01:14.73]Excuse my drip yeah pardon me
[01:16.40]Show me a list of who hard as me
[01:18.69]It can get ugly
[01:20.85]Huh
[01:21.22]Would you leave or stay like you love me
[01:24.28]From the bottom all I know is the struggle
[01:27.05]Can't get no job so all I know is the hustle
[01:31.29]Right back after tour ain't got time for no attitude
[01:34.56]Why I cannot lose feel like I had to do it
[01:37.74]I'm in my savage mood put a lil' back into it
[01:41.07]Treat me with gratitude I ain't no average dude
[01:43.55]Need my rims offset like Cardi B
[01:45.74]This might be my hardest beat
[01:46.84]Put the blame on Pee he started me
[01:48.76]Got the game from Big he guarded me
[01:50.22]Coach threw me in took me out the streets
[01:52.06]Now I get racks to rap on beats
[01:53.41]I still know plugs with packs for cheap
[01:55.34]Killers owe favors they'll whack for free
[01:56.90]Never did fraud I got cash receipts
[01:58.53]Lotta n***as get they swag from me
[02:00.05]Don't tell nobody 'bout bags from me
[02:01.56]You were not in the street you wouldn't last a week
[02:03.25]My b***h so bad I pass on freaks
[02:04.85]I'm here 'cause my granny be prayin' for me
[02:06.61]None of these n***as ain't playin' with me
[02:07.93]Got hitters that'll sit in that can for me yeah
[02:10.82]It can get ugly
[02:12.81]Huh
[02:13.09]Would you leave or stay like you love me
[02:16.05]From the bottom all I know is the struggle
[02:19.14]Can't get no job so all I know is the hustle yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Get Ugly (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Baby]
[al:My Turn (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.34]//
[00:02.68]//
[00:04.02]//
[00:23.66]ATL Jacob制作
[00:26.90]场面会变得很难看
[00:28.82]//
[00:29.31]你会不会说走就走 就像你当初爱我那样
[00:32.16]来自社会底层 我深知痛苦的滋味
[00:35.18]找不到工作 我只能想尽各种办法挣钱
[00:38.62]钞票越来越多
[00:40.23]兄弟
[00:40.65]帝国建立起来了 把钞票给有需要的兄弟
[00:43.88]一个晚上我就能挣到很多钱 跟你们这些家伙完全不一样
[00:47.10]不停喝特制饮料 直到我的身体麻木为止 我不想有感情
[00:50.06]我从不模仿任何人
[00:51.53]她现在对我投怀送抱 因为我很出名
[00:53.15]金链子在我的身上缠绕
[00:54.79]我开的是奔驰 不是牧马人
[00:56.41]这也是一种吉普车 只是不便宜
[00:58.07]我很高兴他们就要释放Rico了
[00:59.83]每天都要费尽心思躲那些烦人的女人
[01:01.59]我要开着大卡车 身边准备好枪
[01:03.13]可能会和Starlito到处逛一逛
[01:04.72]我要和兄弟们一起狂嗨
[01:06.36]给我的亲人买汽车
[01:08.10]要是钱包变瘪了
[01:09.64]那我说不定会去抢
[01:11.19]为何大家都在烦我
[01:12.90]离开的每一个人都在从我这里索取
[01:14.73]不好意思 我就是很有钱
[01:16.40]有谁和我一样强悍
[01:18.69]场面会变得很难看
[01:20.85]//
[01:21.22]你会不会说走就走 就像你当初爱我那样
[01:24.28]来自社会底层 我深知痛苦的滋味
[01:27.05]找不到工作 我只能想尽各种办法挣钱
[01:31.29]巡演回来 没时间多说什么
[01:34.56]为何我不能输 感觉我必须做到
[01:37.74]我现在感觉打了鸡血一样 激动得不能自已
[01:41.07]要对我心怀感激 我可不是普通人
[01:43.55]我要给汽车装上高级的轮毂
[01:45.74]这可能是我最强的节奏
[01:46.84]要怪就怪Pee 是他惹的我
[01:48.76]继承Big的事业 他保卫着我
[01:50.22]教练让我进入这个行业 让我从街头拼搏出来
[01:52.06]现在我有钱 可以做音乐
[01:53.41]我依然有价格实惠的供货商
[01:55.34]很多杀手还欠我人情 他们都会为我做事
[01:56.90]从来不骗人 我有很多钱
[01:58.53]很多人都模仿我的风格
[02:00.05]不要跟任何人说起我的成就
[02:01.56]你不曾混过街头 你撑不过一周
[02:03.25]我的女人好迷人 我都不在意别的女人了
[02:04.85]我能有今天 都是因为我的奶奶一直在为我祷告
[02:06.61]这些家伙没人敢招惹我
[02:07.93]很多杀手会为我保驾护航
[02:10.82]场面会变得很难看
[02:12.81]//
[02:13.09]你会不会说走就走 就像你当初爱我那样
[02:16.05]来自社会底层 我深知痛苦的滋味
[02:19.14]找不到工作 我只能想尽各种办法挣钱
